prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon that resembles a snow spirit with a flowing cape and ethereal features.
Imagine a ghostly creature that haunts icy mountains, blending in with the snow and fog.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies winter elegance with icy blue colors and a graceful, slender form.
Design a mythical Pokemon with a frosty aura, featuring unique patterns and an otherworldly presence.
Generate a Pokemon that floats gracefully, combining elements of ice and ghost types in its appearance.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a haunting snow demon, with chilling colors and a mystical appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that captures the essence of winter, with delicate icy features and ethereal beauty.
